title: 4 bed 3 bath 2 car garage 2756 sq ft home in Oakmont Meadows
posting_body: Well maintained 1.5 story home in the quiet established neighborhood of Oakmont Meadows.
Upon entry you are greeted with the formal dining & living area.
Spacious family room with gas fireplace, vaulted ceilings & lots of windows bringing in natural light.
The kitchen includes 42 inch cabinets, sink at window, and a breakfast area.
Owner’s suite downstairs with bay windows in the sitting area.
En-suite bath with dual sinks, garden tub, separate shower, & large walk-in closet.
3 additional bedrooms downstairs with 2 more full baths.
Spacious game room upstairs with attic storage space.
Quick access the Chisholm Trail Parkway, I30, I20.
Minutes to Crowley Elementary, near by Hulen Mall, hospitals, downtown Ft.
Worth, Cultural District, Clearfork for shopping, dining, hiking & biking trails.
